children.text: The sides of the concrete floor slab have not been correctly boxed prior to it being poured, which has resulted in the brickwork wall overhanging the edge of the slab, which has now been built up with a grouting compound, that has no apparent vertical adhesion to the sides of this slab.

The builder should provide the data sheet for this grouting product so that its vertical adhesion ability can be confirmed or otherwise properly extended the edges of this slab using an appropriately designed and certified engineered system.
